column4: how can i get a list of user and group, and what program is being used by a certin user?

ps is a program that is used to list running processes. Type "man ps" to learn more about it. Another quick way to see which processes a specified user is running is by using "top". Just write "top" i a console, and then when it starts up you press "u" followed by the user's username.
